body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Select new duel with random decks
2. play 2 games
3. continue for the 3rd game What is the expected output? What do you see instead? i expect the game to start the 3rd match, i see a crash What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Win 8.1 x64 with Magarena 1,46 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [sarpk...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/101370706045729318272/)
title: Magarena 1.46 crashes on the 3rd game of every duel

content:
_From [sarpk...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/101370706045729318272/) on February 01, 2014 20:42:53_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Select new duel with random decks
2. play 2 games
3. continue for the 3rd game What is the expected output? What do you see instead? i expect the game to start the 3rd match, i see a crash What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Win 8.1 x64 with Magarena 1,46 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=469_
